classData.comment:
/**
 * The AI Client establishes a WebSocket connection to the Neural Link MCP Server.
 * It acts as a bridge, enabling external AI agents to inspect and manipulate the running Neo.mjs application
 * via a standardized JSON-RPC protocol.
 * @class Neo.ai.Client
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 * @singleton
 */
classData.description: The AI Client establishes a WebSocket connection to the Neural Link MCP Server. It acts as a bridge, enabling external AI agents to inspect and manipulate the running Neo.mjs application via a standardized JSON-RPC protocol.
classData.name: Client

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {String} className='Neo.ai.Client'
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: className

classData.comment:
/**
         * @member {Boolean} singleton=true
         * @protected
         */
classData.name: singleton

classData.comment:
/**
         * Add custom configs for data.connection.Websocket, or pass a module or instance.
         * @member {Object|Neo.data.connection.WebSocket|null} socket=null
         */
classData.description: Add custom configs for data.connection.Websocket, or pass a module or instance.
classData.name: socket

classData.comment:
/**
         * The URL of the Neural Link MCP Server's WebSocket endpoint.
         * @member {String} url='ws://127.0.0.1:8081'
         */
classData.description: The URL of the Neural Link MCP Server's WebSocket endpoint.
classData.name: url

classData.comment:
/**
     * @member {Boolean} isConnected=false
     * @protected
     */
classData.name: isConnected

classData.comment:
/**
     * Buffer for console logs generated before connection is established
     * @member {Array} logs=[]
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Buffer for console logs generated before connection is established
classData.name: logs

classData.comment:
/**
     * Map JSON-RPC method prefixes to service instances
     * @member {Object} serviceMap
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Map JSON-RPC method prefixes to service instances
classData.name: serviceMap

classData.comment:
/**
     * @member {Object} services=null
     * @protected
     */
classData.name: services

classData.comment:
/**
     * @member {Neo.data.connection.WebSocket|null} socket=null
     * @protected
     */
classData.name: socket
construct

classData.comment:
/**
     * Establishes the WebSocket connection to the Neural Link MCP Server.
     * Uses Neo.data.connection.WebSocket for robust connection management.
     */
classData.description: Establishes the WebSocket connection to the Neural Link MCP Server. Uses Neo.data.connection.WebSocket for robust connection management.
classData.name: connect

classData.comment:
/**
     * Routes specific JSON-RPC methods to their corresponding implementation.
     * This method acts as the central dispatcher for all AI-driven commands.
     * @param {String} method The JSON-RPC method name
     * @param {Object} params The parameters associated with the method
     * @returns {Promise<*>} The result of the operation
     */
classData.description: Routes specific JSON-RPC methods to their corresponding implementation. This method acts as the central dispatcher for all AI-driven commands.
classData.name: handleRequest
onAppWorkerWindowConnect

classData.comment:
/**
     * @param {Object} data
     * @param {String} data.windowId
     */
classData.name: onAppWorkerWindowDisconnect

classData.comment:
/**
     * Handles incoming messages from the WebSocket.
     * Parses the JSON-RPC payload and delegates valid requests to `handleRequest`.
     * @param {Object} data
     */
classData.description: Handles incoming messages from the WebSocket. Parses the JSON-RPC payload and delegates valid requests to handleRequest.
classData.name: onSocketMessage
onSocketOpen
onSocketClose
onSocketError

classData.comment:
/**
     * Sends a JSON-RPC error response
     * @param {Number|String} id
     * @param {String} message
     * @param {String} [stack]
     */
classData.name: sendError

classData.comment:
/**
     * Sends a JSON-RPC notification (no id)
     * @param {String} method
     * @param {Object} params
     */
classData.name: sendNotification

classData.comment:
/**
     * Sends a JSON-RPC response
     * @param {Number|String} id
     * @param {*} result
     */
classData.name: sendResponse
